_description: All data collected as of December 31, 2023 (or nearest available date)

risk_free_rate.source: Bank of Japan / Ministry of Finance Japan
risk_free_rate.notes: Last trading day of 2023; JGB 10Y yield was 0.61%

equity_beta.notes: Nippon Steel trades on Tokyo Stock Exchange, beta calculated vs TOPIX index

equity_risk_premium.notes: Slightly higher than US ERP due to market liquidity and governance factors

cost_of_debt.source: Company filings, Japan Credit Rating Agency
cost_of_debt.notes: Japanese corporate bonds trade at tight spreads vs JGBs; Nippon is investment grade

capital_structure.source: Tokyo Stock Exchange, Nippon Steel FY2023 Annual Report (March 2023)
capital_structure.notes: Market cap based on 12/29/2023 closing price; debt/cash from most recent fiscal year end

tax_rate.description: Japan effective corporate tax rate (national + local)
tax_rate.notes: Combines national corporate tax (~23.2%) plus local enterprise and inhabitant taxes

irp_adjustment.methodology: Interest Rate Parity: WACC_USD = (1 + WACC_JPY) * (1 + Rf_USD) / (1 + Rf_JPY) - 1
irp_adjustment.notes: IRP adjustment converts JPY cost of capital to USD equivalent for cross-border valuation

deal_context.notes: Nippon announced acquisition of USS on 12/18/2023
